casebody.data:
Pamela C. BARRETT, Individually and as Executor of the Estate of Donald Collins Clements, Jr.
v.
Nancy COSTON No. 346P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2019 Wesley A. Collins, Attorney at Law, Morehead City, Russell C. Alexander, Attorney at Law, Samuel Morris-Bloom, Attorney at Law, for Barrett, Pamela C. (Ind. & Ex.). Arey W. Grady, III, Attorney at Law, New Bern, Ross T. Hardeman, Attorney at Law, for Coston, Nancy.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 12th of October 2018 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."
